short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fun way to communicate your mood with friends!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Going through a series of mixed feelings? This emotional tracker makes your emotions known to your friends and keeps you updated on how they are doing too.

Mood Circle makes all your emotions heard. Inputting your feelings throughout the day into this extension allows you to monitor your own emotional health and see those of your friends. 

In this extension you can:
- Easily log your current emotion
- Share your current emotions with your friends
- See your friendâ€™s emotion status
